4. const arr = [{1,2},{3,4},{5,6}] Output=[1,2,3,4,5,6]
   This will throw error as object consists of key value pair it was asked to confuse me. Actually array should be like this const
   arr = [{1:1,2:2},{1:3,2:4},{1:5,2:6}];
